original_text: Then they burned the whole city and everything that was in it. They stored the gold, silver, bronze and iron things with the Lord's valuable things.
korean_text: 무리가 그 성과 그 가운데에 있는 모든 것을 불로 사르고 은금과 동철 기구는 여호와의 집 곳간에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: Then they burned the whole city
and everything that was in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있던 모든 것도 불태웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: They stored the gold, silver, bronze and iron things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 금, 은, 놋쇠, 쇠 붙이들을
